name: It's 5 O'Clock Somewhere
description:
This game was made for the Brackeys August 2020 game jam. The theme was "Rewind." This is the first complete game I've made.

Tools Used: Unity, Blender

Credits:

The Show Must Be Go by Kevin MacLeod

Link: https://incompetech.filmmusic.io/song/4509-the-show-must-be-go
